name: Jacob
text: Hey there! Have you ever thought about how powerful recycling really is?

name: Jacob
text: For example, recycling just one aluminum can saves enough energy to power a TV for about three hours.

name: Jacob
text: And when we recycle paper, we reduce air pollution by a huge amount compared to producing it from new raw materials.

name: Jacob
text: Plastic is even more serious... a single plastic bottle can take up to 450 years to decompose in nature.

name: Jacob
text: Glass is amazing though, because it can be recycled over and over again without losing its quality.

name: Jacob
text: So every time you recycle, you are saving energy, reducing pollution, and helping protect our planet.

name: Jacob
text: Small actions really can make a big difference!
